storyInfo: 'Life in Laterano is precious.' Does Ezell, your typical Lateran, have to choose a path he never once considered? And how did the decisively atypical Andoain choose his path?

attributes.content: Cecelia, watch out!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mister Ezell!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Guide... We have to hold our ground!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: It's you! Cecelia isn't your bargaining chip!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ezell, give her to me!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Hey, Ezell! What's the big idea? Don't tell me you're working with these...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Heretics? Terrorists? Apostates? Are those the only names that the Church can come up with?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Out of the way, Patia!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You were right, Fiammetta... It's not easy to change the way someone thinks.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: That goes for both of us.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You look like you're doing well.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Much thanks to you. You look like you've aged a lot, though... 'Guide.'
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Haha, I have you to thank for that, too. The gunshot wound took forever to heal.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Hahaha, not bad. Definitely better than having her shoot you.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: That is true.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Lemuen almost died.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It was the better option, over her bullet.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Looks like that mental illness of yours hasn't gotten any better.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hey, kid. You must be Ezell.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: (Another Legata...? What should I...?)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: A fallen angel?! Miss Fiammetta, what's going on?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ah... you fell. Of course. You shot at me.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You can't feel anymore.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: So I use my eyes to see and my mind to think.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The little girl there is Cecelia, right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Miss, you have horns, but you also have a halo... Are you a Sankta?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Uh, maybe? I don't exactly know, actually.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Listen, Ezell. Bring Cecelia over here. She'll be fine.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'm supposed to trust a fallen angel?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I've gotta be more trustworthy than a pissed-off Liberi.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hey! You mean that bitch over there, right?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Mostima... We haven't finished her mother's funeral yet.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Whoa, I almost bought into that. Are you really such a dutiful curate for this Ecclesia Requietum, Andoain?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima! Did you follow me here just to catch up on old times?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Ezell, have you made up your mind yet?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Cecelia, we...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Miss...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia... You aren't done yet.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Andoain, you've got a decent crowd here.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You brought so many with you just to get Cecelia?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, almost forgot. I have a message for you. It's from the guy in the Lock and Key—
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Your bravery is commendable, but you won't like the final answer.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Thank you for that. I may not be fortunate enough to walk my path with it, but I benefited greatly from its opening my eyes all those years ago.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Look at you... Are you sure you 'benefited?'
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Only the wearer knows where the shoe pinches.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: —Not good! Ezell, stand back!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Can you believe it—
I saw an ocean formed of faith.
That concludes the report for this operation. Some of my colleagues present were involved in the incident. If you have anything to add, please do.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Brothers and sisters, I propose we immediately declare a state of emergency across the entire city. Andoain is already enough trouble to deal with, but now we have a 'mixed-blood Sankta' on our hands too.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Gun-Knight Giovanni, the conference is set to open soon. Surely you know that a state of emergency would lead to panic among the envoys?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Your Eminence, we face a dangerous element. If a little panic could solve the problem at hand, I consider that an easy win.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: His Holiness has been planning this conference for years... the 'Summit of Nations.' It could be the key to Laterano's primacy on land as we know it, but now... a panic threatens to destroy this key.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: And how do you know that Andoain won't bring this conference to ruin if you leave him be?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: No need to worry, Gun-Knight Giovanni. We're talking about a group of desperate people without a future and a small girl of unknown background.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oren, how do you think we Laterans have enjoyed peace for a millennium? It's because we stayed vigilant, taking no chances with such uncertainties!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: (Even though Laterans set off explosions on the streets day in and day out, huh?)
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The way I see it, the Reverend Gun-Knight just might be looking for an opportunity to use that awe-inspiring but so often holstered gun of yours?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I take pride in my gun. Got a problem with that?!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Please, this is urgent. May I continue?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: ...You may.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I'm sure you all know that Mostima and I used to... work with Andoain.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The Andoain I know isn't one to go off half-cocked. He wouldn't start a war without preparing for it. So even though he could sow chaos in Laterano, he wouldn't do it without a reason.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The only clue the Astray have given us so far is their attempts on the mixed-blood girl called Cecelia.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: We can surmise that taking her is their primary objective.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And since they already have her in their possession, I think Andoain's next step is very likely to be... exfiltrating Laterano.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Therefore, I suggest we focus on the two following points.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: First, we need to step up our border controls and deploy more guards to the crossings. We should also form a special elite squad to locate their hideout and bring Andoain in.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Secondly, to be on the safe side, I would like the Seventh Tribunal to lead the investigation into whether the Astray have made contact with the visiting envoys to determine whether or not they are targeting the conference.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: As for the conference itself...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Proceed according to plan, right? That's what you have in mind, isn't it? We're just testing the waters, anyway.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, I've got to say, though. The cold buffet's desserts are disgusting. The cactus tarts are an atrocity. I would like to see some improvement there.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I think there's a certain charm to the taste.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: I agree with Mostima on that point, and that point alone.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Blasphemy! I think they're delicious!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Gun-Knight Giovanni has spoken. I suppose we can all agree, then?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Anything that Giovanni likes, you know is bound to be terrible.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Mostima, belittling me again, are you?!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Please, my children, quiet down. I'm too old for all this bickering.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: The laws instruct us to face the unknown with goodwill...
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: We mustn't treat fruit tarts with such scorn.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: And why am I unfamiliar with this law?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I just thought of it this morning.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Your Holiness...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: We'll go with your plan.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Vel, Giovanni, give Fiammetta all the help she needs.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Andoain... will make his way to his goal.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Phew... This is why I hate closed-door meetings...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: We spent three minutes on the main topic! The rest of the meeting was everyone babbling their stupid side conversations!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Excuse me, Seniores? May I ask what the decision was?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You're still here.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm taking over the Andoain case. Thank you for your work the past couple days. You should head home to get some rest. I'll talk to the Notarial Hall later. Everything you've done will be written off as you helping us out.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Miss Fiammetta, I...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Anything that comes after this is way beyond the bounds of your authority and ability. Don't forget. You're still in training.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I know you're worried about Cecelia, but I'm taking over this case, and that's the best case scenario you could hope for.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Miss Fiammetta, are you friends with this... fallen angel? And the both of you are familiar with Andoain?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Is that your answer to both of those questions?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: We aren't familiar. We're nemeses.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But don't you worry. I won't take it out on Cecelia. I don't really understand what was going on with her this morning... but she's still a kid.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What about you? You stayed there for two whole days. Did Andoain say anything to you?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Just a bunch of heretical nonsense.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I suggest you forget all of it, then.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You still have your whole life ahead of you, right?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Go home and take a couple days off, then keep up with your good work at the Notarial Hall. You are pretty qualified for the job if you ask me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Cherish your life, you know? Life in Laterano is precious. Even I look back on it fondly sometimes.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: My life...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Right, unlike them, I'm just a regular nobody.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Okay, let's clock out!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The Pontifica Cohors have taken over the border checkpoints, and the Apostolic Knights are keeping an eye out for us too. We won't be making it out anytime soon... We have a safehouse, but still...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I can't get in touch with Oren either... Dammit!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: No matter. We can wait.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Cecelia?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Do you regret your decision?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: But if I went with Miss Fiammetta... she would've taken me... to the Basilica, right?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I still haven't figured out... my goodbye to Mamma.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It's okay, Cecelia. You still have lots of time to think.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Mister Friar... There was a lady with horns and a halo in the Ecclesia Requietum just now... Is she... a Sankta?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Maybe. Maybe not. It's up to her to decide.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I thought... Sankta are Sankta?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: That's true for most of us.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But some people get to choose. Or perhaps I should say they don't have a choice but to choose, because of some... unfortunate circumstance.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Incidentally, you too have to choose, Cecelia. As for whether that is fortunate or not... no one can tell.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Can't the Sankta be with the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Of course they can. You are the living proof.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But... I'm causing everyone a lot of trouble, right?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Even Mister Ezell...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: If you're always worrying about everything, you won't get anything done.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: People will always fight. Neither 'gentleness' nor 'understanding' can stop that.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: A lot of times, when people fight, it's not because one side is right and one side is wrong. It's because the things that both sides have to do conflict with each other.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: In other words, the things that you and I need to do are different, and that means we're in somebody else's way.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Why can't we go the same way together?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Because, for a lot of people, the path that they take is determined by the path itself.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: For example, the Sankta and the Sarkaz. No one can say why the two sides fought each other at first, but the hatred between them has paved the road for everyone.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Can't we choose our own path?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: We can, Cecelia, but it's not that simple. If you want to leave the path you are on and find a new path forward, you must first make your way through a boundless wilderness...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It's vast and empty there. You might never find that new path, even if you give up everything you've ever known.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Then... why do we still have to look?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Right... why do we have to look?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Maybe it's because that's what we want.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: 'What we want...' Is that so important?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It's the only thing we still have.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Mister Friar... Can I ask a question?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What is it that you want?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia, can I tell you a little story?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Sure, Mister Friar. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Many years ago, when I was still young, I ran into some... setbacks, and then I left.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Where did you go?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Anywhere. I traveled everywhere.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: There was a place I stayed for a while. It was a very small town, and it felt a little like my hometown.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But it was even more run-down. Life was tough for everyone there.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: (Huh? That doesn't sound like Laterano...)
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Once, I passed by the town's pub and came across a humming drunkard. He threw up all over me and insisted that I'd tripped him, and that I should pay for his drink.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Everyone in the pub... no, everyone in town laughed at him and cursed at him.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Those who were scared of him avoided him. Everyone called him a dirty, filthy moron, a lowlife, a sick scumbag... He was a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: They never chased him out of the town, however. He kept living from one day to the next, doing little odd jobs.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Then, on one windy, rainy night, a night when no one would go outside, the church's bell started to ring. It was an alarm, and it woke everyone up... There were... some bad people in town.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It was lucky that the bells woke everyone. It was hard, but we chased the bad people away. No one knew who rang the bells, and we all thought it was a miracle...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I headed in the direction of the bell tower and reached the wastes beyond. There, I found the church watchman digging a grave. Next to him was a cart, and in it a thin coffin, with the Sarkaz drunkard inside, wounded all over.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I started to help digging. The watchman kept complaining as he dug. He said he was saving the casket for his mother and it was a waste to give it to a Sarkaz. Then he complained that he'd have to bury the sick Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The watchman said that, not long after the bells started ringing, the Sarkaz came and knocked on his door, telling him to run, before the man died at his doorstep.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The watchman said that since he saw it was about to rain, he couldn't bear seeing the Sarkaz man sleep out in the streets, and so he let him into the bell tower for the night.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: He kept complaining and kept digging. Then, when he was finished, he stood in front of the grave and sang a song that the drunkard always used to sing, even though he didn't remember how the second half went.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: In the end, he complained a little more, and poured half a bottle on the grave.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The winds through hills on high...♪ Tail the hero's farflung stride...♪ Over long ways long...♪ Over briars and thorns...♪
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Sorry, I don't remember it either.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: That's... the song that Mamma and Rosella taught me...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: So... the Sarkaz man rang the bell?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I think he did.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: So he was the hero that saved everyone?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Maybe. I don't know if someone like him can be called a hero, but I think most people probably wouldn't want to call him one.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Maybe he was just trying to help the watchman who helped him.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What about you, Mister Friar? Do you think he was a hero?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: What is a hero, Cecelia?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I thought about it for a long time... but I know that the answer to this question doesn't tell us who the Sarkaz man was. Rather, it tells us who I am.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I don't think he himself climbed up the bell tower to be a hero.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But it doesn't matter if we sing his praises, look at him with scorn, or even forget about him. None of that changes anything about him anymore.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: All the questions that I pondered have nothing to do with him. Only me. Why did I witness this? What does it mean to me? How is it going to guide me forward?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It is always the living who are questioned.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But I kept thinking and thinking, what if he didn't do what he did?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What if he did it, but led the fanatics... the bad people to the bell tower?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What if the townspeople couldn't fend the bad people off even after they got woken up?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: And what if... what if he even died on the bell tower, and no one ever found him?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: There are no guaranteed successes, and there are no choices that are certain to be right.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: So I came to this conclusion. On that rainy night, he climbed up the bell tower because he wanted to.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: It's the most straightforward conclusion, out of somewhat stubborn goodwill.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Whether that's true or not doesn't concern him.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: He was a hero, no different from the hero in the song.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: The winds through hills on high...♪ Tail the hero's farflung stride...♪
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Over long ways long...♪ Over briars and thorns...♪
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Everyone starts humming the song.
Their quiet singing drifts throughout the room.
I feel peace.
In this Lateran evening.
A peace that I have not known for a long time.
Are you thinking something, Mister Friar?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: No, nothing at all.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Thank you, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You're looking at something...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Is that a bell tower?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It's Laterano's bell tower. A very, very old tower made of stone. I often went there when I still lived in Laterano. It was so close to Heaven.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Heaven... Is that where Mamma is?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: If that's where you wish for her to be, that's where she is.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Mister Friar, could you help me with something?
attributes.name: Cecelia
